unroll.title: Unroll Elements Regex
unroll.description: Path to array to unroll, e.g. ^root\.child\.ElementToUnroll$

inherit.title: Copy Elements Regex
inherit.description: Regex matching elements to copy into each unrolled event, e.g. ^root\.(childA|childB|childC)$

unrollIdxField.title: Unroll Index Field
unrollIdxField.description: Add a field with this name, containing the index at which the item was located, starting from 0

pretty.title: Pretty Print
pretty.description: Whether to pretty print the output XML
